text: Koch Industries, Inc. is an American multinational corporation based in Wichita, Kansas, United States. It involves manufacturing, trading, and investments. It was founded as Wood River Oil and Refining Company in 1940, and later as Rock Island Oil & Refining Company. Charles Koch is the chairman and David H. Koch was the vice chairman until his death in 2019. ==Other websites== * Koch Industries Category:1940 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Kansas Category:Wichita, Kansas Category:20th- century establishments in Kansas Category:American fuel companies
title: Koch Industries
